name: annkecamera
0:
”Alexa, show office.”
”Alexa, show my office camera.”
”Alexa, hide office.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With annke camera skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your ANNKE connected cameras using your voice. This skill supports the products of Annke camera. 

Follow the steps below to setup your camera and link your ANNKE account:
1.Use the names you previously set up. They are shown in the annke app and can be changed
2.Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group
3. From your Alexa App, search for annke camera, enable the skill and link it to your ANNKE account by signing in with your ANNKE account
4. Discover your cameras by asking Alexa “Discover devices” or by pressing the Discover Devices button in the Alexa app
Once your account is linked, viewing your cameras is supported on Amazon Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV, 2nd Gen Fire Stick or Fire Tablets (7th gen and above). To see your camera, just say “Alexa, show my (camera name) camera”

If you have any questions, please provide us by FAQ email support@annke.com.
